whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us?
whyChooseUs.description1: T-Construction CJSC was founded in April 2016.
whyChooseUs.description2: The company has been able to prove itself as a reliable partner during its history of activities. Working with us is always convenient and mutually beneficial, which is vital for a long-term and continuous cooperation, the proof of which is the constantly growing list of our clients. We stand out in the industry with the combination of optimal price and high quality. The company has all the necessary resources to implement any project from the initial steps to commissioning.

meta.title: {title} - Service Page
meta.description: Learn more about {title} service and how we ensure quality, reliability, and safety.

description.content: Starting from 2020, the company has been carrying out various construction works within the framework of state procurement. During these years, we have carried out construction and reconstruction of dozens of schools, kindergartens, sports facilities, improvement of gardens and yards, construction of playgrounds, construction and reconstruction of water supply and drainage systems.

Within the framework of the United Nations Development Program in Armenia, we implemented a state subsidy program aimed at increasing the energy efficiency and thermal efficiency of apartment buildings in Syunik and Lori marzes.

items.content: Our team has the experience and technical skills to build and install cables of any complexity. We use high-quality materials and modern technologies.
Our engineers develop unique and efficient projects, ensuring a high level of safety and reducing energy losses.
We provide professional advice for the optimization and modernization of power supply systems.

description.content:
Choose Us for your energy needs. Our team is ready to implement the most complex projects, ensuring that your most ambitious requirements are met.
Durability, reliability and safety are among the important characteristics of the power supply system. All electrical installation works are carried out in accordance with high quality standards, cables and equipment of reliable and well-known manufacturers are used. Construction of 0.22kW, 0.4kW, 6kW, 10kW, 35kW and 110kW substations and cable lines are carried out.
In the development of Armenia's power system, the construction of the first 110kW cable power line became an important achievement, ensuring a new level and stability of power transmission.

In the course of long-term work, T-Construction CJSC has gained rich experience in performing aerial and underground cable work. The main advantage of the company is its highly qualified, certified, experienced engineers and specialists.

The company provides a complete set of services: design of general networks, design of power transmission and distribution lines, all necessary permits, patents, design and planning documents, supply of cables and materials, installation.
Power grids and power supply are the pillars of the industry for telecommunications operators and service companiesâ€¤

T-Construction CJSC has gained a reputation in the market as a reliable partner and a supplier of modern technologies for the electricity industry by providing a systematic approach to the construction of high and low voltage electrical networks, optical grounding wires and transmission lines, as well as by supplying and installing power transformer substations and alternative energy systems.
The leading specialists in the field are ready to carry out restoration, overhaul and asphalting on rural roads, national highways of any complexity.
Since 2016, we have carried out road construction works of various complexity.
